revised_title: Royal Society Annual Address on Scientific Encouragement and Collaboration
tldr: In this address, Lord Wrottesley discusses the importance of supporting scientific research and education, encouraging young scientists, and collaborating with other scientific societies. He also emphasizes the need for government support and consultation with scientific experts to ensure the effective use of public funds and the advancement of science for the benefit of society.
